dmca.title: Poet complains of copying
dmca.body:
Notice of Copyright reference
http://whiskeylynn.blogspot.com/2003_10_01_whiskeylynn_archive.html

Mr C R Slater
[private]
Newcastle upon Tyne
[private]
England
[private]
 
Sir, Madam,

I am the author and copyright holder of the below material, one poem
illegally displayed as located on your Internet servers, this material has
been on my web site since 1986 ongoing and has been taken and reproduced
by a user or users with you.

I write for three registered UK charities and they provide me with free
copyright on all my works, all poems are sold in booklet form to raise
income for charity.

I swear on oath and as a committed Christian too (under penalty of Federal
and European prosecution for perjury that I do own the copyright to the
material designated below.

If you require a signed copy let me know, I can post one today or send one
as an image attachment or post a copy on my servers for you to view and
print.

Mr C R Slater

Please Note

1.) the material has been taken, used without my given consent or
authorisation (data theft)
2.) Copyright and anti theft legal warnings have clearly been ignored
infringed and breached
3.) the data thief has falsified the author information on your site
(plagiarism)
4.) my written work has been left with out any copyright warnings and is
open to abuse on your server
5.) Your own TOS (terms of service have been breached)
6.)As long as this work is displayed on servers without given author
consent your company, any hosting servers are liable for 
payment of commission and royalties 
soliciting traffic by illegal use of my work to potentially gain interest
to your service without given consent

If you look through Yahoo MSN or Google search you will see this is taken
from my own web via the given URL
